name: Mara Panajia
subtitle: President Henkel Italia - GM HCB. Always committed to talent and uniqueness promotion. Among the 100 successful Italian women (Forbes) in 2021 and in 2023 among the 100 Italian managers (Forbes) and the 50 MPW (Fortune).
about: I have been working in multinational companies for over 25 years, most of which I spent at Henkel: a long story that begins in 2000, when I joined the Laundry & Home Care Local Marketing Unit as Senior Brand Manager. Marketing has always been the leitmotif of my professional life - except for the years spent in Finance, where I started and from where my passion for numbers and figures comes, and in Sales. Among the key moments of my career, the transfer in 2014 to the D√ºsseldorf HQ in the role of Corporate VP International Marketing, the return to Italy 5 years later as General Manager Laundry & Home Care, the recognition of Forbes in 2021 as one of the 100 successful Italian Women and the recent appointment as General Manager of Henkel Consumer Brands Italia and President and CEO of Henkel Italia. At every step, the path in Henkel is marked by the profound sharing of values and visions and fueled by the pursuit of virtuous objectives that can help generate a positive impact.
